titles.title: Waste Reduction Clearinghouse Act
A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish the Waste Reduction Clearinghouse, and for other purpose.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 6/4/1987--Introduced. Waste Reduction Clearinghouse Act - Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish within the Agency the Office of Waste Reduction to administer the Waste Reduction Clearinghouse. Establishes such Clearinghouse within the Agency to collect and disseminate information on: (1) waste reduction (hazardous waste) technical assistance and grant programs at the State level; and (2) technical information and research. Requires that such Clearinghouse provide on-line computer access for the public. Authorizes appropriations.
